mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE franchise_sales (id, franchise_id, sales_date, price) VALUES (#{id}, #{franchise.id}, #{salesDate}, #{price})
INSERT INTO sales_detail (sales_id, menu_id, quantity, price) VALUES (#{sales.id}, #{menu.id}, #{quantity}, #{price})

INSERT INTO sales_detail (sales_id, menu_id, quantity, price) VALUES
(#{detail.sales.id}, #{detail.menu.id}, #{detail.quantity}, #{detail.price})

INSERT IGNORE franchise_sales (id, franchise_id, sales_date, price) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.franchise.id}, #{item.salesDate}, #{item.price})
mapper.sql: SELECT sales.id , sales.price , sales.sales_date , sales.franchise_id , detail.quantity detail_quantity , detail.price detail_price , detail.menu_id detail_menu_id , menu.menu detail_menu_menu , menu.price detail_menu_price FROM franchise_sales sales LEFT JOIN sales_detail detail ON sales.id = detail.sales_id LEFT JOIN menu ON detail.menu_id = menu.id
mapper.select: SELECT fs.id, SUM(fs.price) as price, fs.sales_date as salesDate FROM franchise_sales fs WHERE fs.franchise_id = #{franchise.id} and fs.sales_date < now() GROUP BY fs.franchise_id, MONTH(fs.sales_date) ORDER BY fs.sales_date DESC LIMIT 0, 10

SELECT fs.id, SUM(fs.price) price, fs.sales_date salesDate FROM franchise_sales fs WHERE fs.franchise_id = #{franchise.id} and fs.sales_date < now() GROUP BY YEAR(fs.sales_date), WEEK(fs.sales_date) ORDER BY fs.sales_date DESC LIMIT 0, 10

SELECT fs.id, SUM(fs.price) price, fs.sales_date salesDate FROM franchise_sales fs WHERE fs.franchise_id = #{franchise.id} and fs.sales_date < now() GROUP BY fs.franchise_id, YEAR(fs.sales_date), WEEK(fs.sales_date), DAY(fs.sales_date) ORDER BY fs.sales_date DESC LIMIT 0, 10

SELECT today.total_sales totalSales, today.total_sales - IFNULL(yesterday.total_sales, 0) increase FROM ( SELECT SUM(fs.price) AS total_sales FROM franchise_sales fs WHERE fs.franchise_id = #{id} AND DATE(fs.sales_date) = CURDATE() GROUP BY DAY(fs.sales_date) ) AS today LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(fs.price) AS total_sales FROM franchise_sales fs WHERE fs.franchise_id = #{id} AND DATE(fs.sales_date) = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY DAY(fs.sales_date) ) AS yesterday ON 1=1

SELECT today.total_sell totalSell, today.total_sell - IFNULL(yesterday.total_sell, 0) increase FROM ( SELECT COUNT(d.sales_id) AS total_sell FROM franchise_sales fs LEFT JOIN sales_detail d ON fs.id = d.sales_id WHERE fs.franchise_id = #{id} AND DATE(fs.sales_date) = CURDATE() GROUP BY DAY(fs.sales_date) ) AS today LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(d.sales_id) AS total_sell FROM franchise_sales fs LEFT JOIN sales_detail d ON fs.id = d.sales_id WHERE fs.franchise_id = #{id} AND DATE(fs.sales_date) = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY DAY(fs.sales_date) ) AS yesterday ON 1=1
